articles.title: Wrinkle in Space-Time Helps Webb Reveal Earendel – Most Distant Star Ever Detected - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Observations Hint That Earendel Has Companion Star Detecting extremely distant stars, or those closest in time to the big bang, can provide insights into the first few chapters of the history of our universe. In 2022, the Hubble Space Telescope broke its own …
articles.content:

articles.title: Logitech's new laptop stand and keyboard folds down into a cute little box - The Verge
articles.description: Logitech’s Casa Pop-Up Desk is a neat and ergonomic desk setup that can be easily folded away at the end of the day. It costs £179 in the UK, though a US release is TBA.
